attributes.action: Allow All Gamekeepers To Conviscate Poachers' Dogs, Ferrets and Firearms.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Only some Gamekeepers appointed to do so by Lords of Manors and Royalty are allowed to conviscate Poachers dogs, ferrets and equipment used for killing game at this current moment. All Gamekeepers should have the power to conviscate these materials but currently NO Gamekeepers are allowed to conviscate Poachers firearms. Gamekeepers should have the right to conviscate Poachers friearms, this is why I have created this petition in the request for Game Kepers to have more power.
